mapper.sql: id, fk_ord_order_id, fk_shp_shop_id, fk_pro_product_id, create_user_id, update_user_id, unique_code_before, unique_code_after, type_before, type_after, finish_price_before, finish_price_after, sale_user_id_before, sale_user_id_after, after_sale_guarantee_before, after_sale_guarantee_after, remark_before, remark_after, address_before, address_after, insert_time, update_time
mapper.select: select omr.finish_price_before 'finishPriceBefore', omr.finish_price_after 'finishPriceAfter', omr.type_before 'typeBefore', omr.type_after 'typeAfter', (SELECT uShopR.`name` FROM shp_user_shop_ref uShopR WHERE uShopR.fk_shp_shop_id = omr.fk_shp_shop_id AND uShopR.fk_shp_user_id = omr.`sale_user_id_before`) 'saleUserNameBefore', (SELECT uShopR.`name` FROM shp_user_shop_ref uShopR WHERE uShopR.fk_shp_shop_id = omr.fk_shp_shop_id AND uShopR.fk_shp_user_id = omr.`sale_user_id_after`) 'saleUserNameAfter', omr.insert_time 'updateTime', (SELECT uShopR.`name` FROM shp_user_shop_ref uShopR WHERE uShopR.fk_shp_shop_id = omr.fk_shp_shop_id AND uShopR.fk_shp_user_id = omr.`update_user_id`) 'updateUserName' from ord_modify_record omr where omr.fk_ord_order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and omr.fk_shp_shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by insert_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into ord_modify_record (id, fk_ord_order_id, fk_shp_shop_id, fk_pro_product_id, create_user_id, update_user_id, unique_code_before, unique_code_after, type_before, type_after, finish_price_before, finish_price_after, sale_user_id_before, sale_user_id_after, after_sale_guarantee_before, after_sale_guarantee_after, remark_before, remark_after, address_before, address_after, insert_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fkOrdOrderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fkShpShopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fkProProductId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uniqueCodeBefore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uniqueCodeAfter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeBefore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeAfter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{finishPriceBefore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{finishPriceAfter,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{saleUserIdBefore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{saleUserIdAfter,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{afterSaleGuaranteeBefore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{afterSaleGuaranteeAfter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarkBefore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarkAfter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressBefore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressAfter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
